**User:**
I've been thinking about creating some currencies, and I was wondering, can anyone create a currency with any name they want, without having to own an ID with that name?

**AI Assistant:**
No, that's not correct. To create a currency with a specific name, you need to own an ID with that same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency with that name, and they can only do so once. You need to have control over the ID with the desired name to create a currency with that name.

**User:**
That's interesting. I was thinking, what if I want to create multiple currencies with the same name, like "gold@". Can I do that by using different IDs?

**AI Assistant:**
You can't create multiple currencies with the same name, like "gold@". The controller of the ID "gold@" can only create one currency with that name. If you want to create multiple currencies, you need to have different IDs with different names. This ensures that each currency has a unique identity and avoids confusion. So, if you want to create multiple currencies, you'll need to come up with distinct names for each one.
